statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_data;
SELECT feedback_id, employee_id, sentiment_score FROM feedback_data;
SELECT * FROM feedback_data WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback_data WHERE sentiment_score > 3;
SELECT survey_date, feedback_category FROM feedback_data ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_data ORDER BY feedback_id DESC, survey_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM feedback_data WHERE sentiment_score > 3;
SELECT employee_id, feedback_category FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_category = 'Teamwork' AND employee_id IN (101, 102, 103);
SELECT distinct sentiment_score, count(*) FROM feedback_data GROUP BY sentiment_score HAVING count(*) > 2;
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_score, MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_score FROM feedback_data;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM employee_feedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT employee_id, sentiment_score FROM employee_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 101;
SELECT survey_id, survey_date, survey_response FROM survey_data WHERE employee_id = 201;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(survey_id) AS number_of_surveys FROM survey_data GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employee_feedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC
SELECT employee_id, feedback_text FROM employee_feedback WHERE sentiment_score < 0.3 LIMIT 5
SELECT employee_id, feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM employee_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id LIMIT 10
SELECT feedback_id, sentiment_score, employee_id FROM employee_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%good%'
SELECT survey_id, survey_date, employee_id FROM survey_data WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY survey_date DESC
SELECT * FROM employee_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM employee_feedback;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, department FROM employee_info;
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE survey_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT survey_id, survey_name, feedback_count FROM survey_data ORDER BY feedback_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_info WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employee_info WHERE hire_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT survey_name, survey_date FROM survey_data ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback_count FROM employee_feedback GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT survey_name, feedback_count FROM survey_data WHERE feedback_count > 10;
SELECT * FROM feedback_sentiments;
SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM feedback_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT name, department, position FROM employee_details;
SELECT survey_name, survey_date FROM survey_data WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT response_id, response FROM survey_responses WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM feedback_sentiments ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM feedback_sentiments WHERE employee_id = 101 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, department FROM employee_details WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM survey_responses INNER JOIN survey_data ON survey_responses.survey_id = survey_data.survey_id;
SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM feedback_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT insight_id, insight_text, insight_category FROM EmployeeInsights WHERE insight_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT survey_question, survey_response FROM EmployeeSurvey WHERE survey_date = '2022-05-15';
SELECT analysis_id, sentiment_category FROM EmployeeSentimentAnalysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE employee_id = 123 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' AND feedback_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT insight_text, insight_category FROM EmployeeInsights WHERE employee_id = 456 ORDER BY insight_date ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, sentiment_category, sentiment_score FROM EmployeeSentimentAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.7 ORDER BY feedback_id LIMIT 5;
SELECT survey_question, survey_response FROM EmployeeSurvey WHERE survey_date > '2022-06-01' AND survey_date < '2022-06-30' ORDER BY survey_response DESC;
